name: Breathing Simulator 2
description:
I DID NOT MAKE THIS! I uploaded this because I want to share this gem.

support the dev

40+ ENDINGS (WOW)!!!!! 

MORE WACKY CHARACTERS!!!

INTENSE BREATHING GAMEPLAY!!1! 

and ALL NEW FISHING MINIGAME!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! 

made in about a week

Controls: Space - Skip Text

Click- Interacting with the game 

Upon reaching an ending: Retry from beginning - Basically pressing the green flag. You won't lose any endings, but you'll lose your items. Retry from checkpoint - A quick retry that sends you back to the last few choices. Items - Check what items you have and what they do. True Reset - Wipes all data (including endings). Use with caution. happy breathing! 

credit where it's due. (especially pepperman gaming) 

if you find any bugs well done

p.s. linux support is buggy
